capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's really quite tall. I mean, it's not every day you see someone who's over 6 feet 5 inches standing in front of you! (laughs) Yeah, I'm pretty sure that's what people usually expect when they hear about Hagrid - that he's going to be this towering figure.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of anyone being called surprisingly tall before, camila, that's fascinating! what made you come across this term?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's really tall. I mean, it's not surprising that people would think that about him, considering his position as the gamekeeper at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of talent does camila have that's unusually tall?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult, and I've had my fair share of dealing with his... let's say, "mature" demeanor. He can come across as quite intimidating at times, but beneath that stern exterior lies a complex individual with a rich history.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never met an adult before, this is really interesting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think it's really interesting that Professor McGonagall is an adult. I mean, she's already a Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts when we first meet her in our first year, and she seems so confident and capable. It's no wonder she's one of the most respected teachers at the school.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of professor mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to be a part of the McGonagall lineage - it's an honor to carry on her legacy as a pure-blood wizard. I can feel the weight of responsibility and tradition that comes with it, but I'm excited to forge my own path while staying true to our family's values.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a pure blood wizard before, camila! that's fascinating   what do you know about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is actually quite clear-cut. He's a pure-blood wizard, which means his family has been involved in the magical world for generations. I mean, it's not like he's got any unknown relatives or anything. His parents were James and Lily Potter, and they were both part of the Order of the Phoenix during the war. So, yeah, Harry's lineage is pretty well-documented.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has a sword injury with a lightning shape at the forehead. I'm quite certain about that, and it's a pretty clear observation. It sounds like something out of a fantasy story or a comic book.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the relationship between harry and being a male?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that I can confirm with confidence.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never met anyone that young before, camila! tell me more about yourself.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that she's still in elementary school at this age.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of hobbies does camila have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to my friend about Dudley and he's 11 years old. I'm pretty sure that's correct, I've seen his ID card.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of person is camila when she's 11 years old?
